so...moving into a new place with someone is more complicated than i thought...the getting ready part is very stressful...VERY STRESSFUL...
;
;and my patience is running out..maybe i'm just an impatient girl...i just think things could be moving a little faster than they are...most of the things we've been working on should've already been done...but they aren't...that's frustrating.. can anyone relate?? ;

guess i am content enough to head off to bed...goodnight and thanks to all of those uplifters!!! you should add me...i don't know how to add anyone...lol...i haven't figured this site out yet!! goodnight!!! peace, love, and blueberry cereal!

FUCK THIS BULL SHIT! i hate living here. Nothing is shared...it's all theirs. FUCK ME.....even though i'm her daughter. GAHHHH! I'm so pissed.
;
;anyone want to give away a used old computer that can get online? hahahahah!

I officially hate all American men. all of them. ;
;
;they suck balls.

From all the comments i have received on my previous blog....I have decided to explain why i say what i say.
;
;1.) MOST of all the guys i have met here...in America...are losers.
;2.) I have NOT met all of them...that would be impossible.
;3.) MOST of the good guys have either a g/f or a b/f.
;4.) Sorry if i offended anyone. I have been through a lot with guys, and it's hard to like them.
;
;Most of you are right, not ALL guys are bad.
;
;MOST OF THEM ARE THOUGH!
;
;so there. ;
